Title: Episode 7
Plot: A young man being held for a minor drugs offence dies in custody at the station while Gene and Sam are out. While Gene tries to protect his team, Sam struggles to conduct a proper investigation into the death. After alienating all his colleagues, he is able to determine that one of them forced him to take cocaine, causing a heart attack, and that the others had been covering.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Kevin Knapman, Andrew Vincent, Sagar Arya, Tom Lloyd-Roberts, Lisa Millett, William Hoyland, Nicholas Blane
